posts.author: ClericofChaos
posts.content:
I've been thinking about Warlock lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

Quick question about Warlock that came up in our game last night.

I'm trying to create an optimized character focused on Warlock. What race/class/feat combinations would you recommend?

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about Warlock?

posts.author: InitiativeTracker
posts.content:
Looking at page 127 of the Player's Handbook, it states that optimizing functions based on your proficiency bonus and ability modifiers.

I think the 2024 changes to optimizing make it much more balanced compared to before.

In our last session, we encountered a Mind Flayer and tried to use optimizing to gain an advantage, but it didn't work out as planned.

posts.author: CriticalElf
posts.content:
When DMing, I like to use optimizing as a way to create interesting challenges for my players.

I've been playing a Aasimar Barbarian in my campaign, and I've noticed that optimizing really impacts how effective the character is in combat.
